text:
Summary says it. This seems to be a problem specifically with 1.6, it works fine
with 1.5. I am reporting this for a friend.

build.xml:1: The processing instruction target matching "[xX][mM][lL]" is not
allowed.

This was stumbled upon from a copy paste from a web site to a build.xml file, it
introduced a space as the first character in the file.

At one point, you could say it makes you make nice XML files, as another point,
it is against the standard right?
creator: jhaltom@feedbackplusinc.com

text: I am changing this to works for me.
creator: peter.reilly@corvil.com
